action.primary: Cools the Blood, stops bleeding, dispels Heat, removes Dampness, relieves toxicity and resolves swelling

indications: Hemoptysis, epistaxis, dysentery, malaria, jaundice, edema, urinary disturbances with turbid discharge, sore throat, pharyngitis, hemorrhoids, carbuncle, erysipelas, Metrorrhagia, metrostaxis, trauma
